mapper.sql: id, url_path, code, menu_type, parent_menu_id, name, menu_url, menu_level, order_num, deleted, create_time, modify_time, create_id, modify_id
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT menu.id, menu.url_path, menu.code, menu.menu_type, menu.parent_menu_id, menu.name, menu.menu_url, menu.menu_level, menu.order_num, menu.deleted, menu.create_time, menu.modify_time, menu.create_id, menu.modify_id from t_account_info account JOIN t_account_role account_role on account.id=account_role.account_id and account.deleted=0 JOIN t_role_info role on role.id=account_role.role_id and role.deleted=0 JOIN t_role_menu role_menu on role.id=role_menu.role_id join t_menu_info menu on role_menu.menu_id=menu.id and menu.deleted=0 where account.id=#{accountId}
